text: Alexander John Such (November 14, 1951 - June 4, 2022) was an American bassist. He was best known as a founding member of the rock band Bon Jovi, and as their bass player, from 1983 to 1994.Alec John Such, Bon Joviâ€™s First Bassist, Dies at 70 He was inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame in 2018. He was born in Yonkers, New York.
